title: Restoration Workshop
overview: Buying and selling antiques is a constantly evolving business. To succeed you have to stand out from the crowd. In this world, dealer and expert restorer Gary Wallis is King, and, from their Restoration Yard in picturesque Henley-on-Thames, he and his team are masters at creating high end pieces of art. This series focuses on Gary and his team on their quest to buy items with the hidden potential and turn it into great items with potential.
